ls.help: Use the 'ls' command to list all files and directories.

pwd.help: Use the 'pwd' command to print the current working directory.

whoami.help: Use the 'whoami' command to display the current user.

uname.help: Use the 'uname' command to print the operating system name.

hostname.help: Use the 'hostname' command to display the system's host name.

uptime.help: Use the 'uptime' command to show how long the system has been running.
